description: Ms. codex. Title provided by cataloger. Apparently European(?) paper, glossy. Ownership statements on fol. 51a, 116a. Origin: According to colophon, Text 6 copied on Wednesday 12 Muḥarram 1003 [September 1594] (fol. 63a).
author: Ḥusayn, Mullā, d. ca. 1673
contents: 10. fol. 116a-123a: Muḥāḍarat al-ʻulamāʼ wa-muḥāwarat al-fuhamāʼ fī awḥad al-kubarāʼ wa-sayyid al-wuzarāʼ / ʻAlam al-Dīn Abī al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Sakhāwī (d. 1245).
extent: i, 123, i leaves : paper ; 250 x 148 mm. bound to 210 x 156 mm.
title: Risālah mukhtaṣarah. al-Qaṣīdah al-ʻajībah ... [etc.].
creator: حسين ملا
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding note: Marbled paper over paper pasteboards. Rebacked with leather. Modern pastedowns and endpapers.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
